description: Supreme Council for Women - Support to the Implementation of the National Strategy for the Advancement of Bahraini Women

subproject.corporate outcome: Civil society, including civil society organizations and voluntary associations, and the private sector contribute to the MDGs in support of national planning strategies and policies
subproject.description: To develop the capacity of the Supreme Council for Women (SCW) Secretariat and strengthen its institutional role in the empowerment of Bahraini Women.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Women Council Capacity Strengt

subproject.corporate outcome: Civil society, including civil society organizations and voluntary associations, and the private sector contribute to the MDGs in support of national planning strategies and policies

subproject.title: Women Council Capacity Strengt

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: To support the participation of Bahraini women in political development of the country through the Supreme Council for Women with especial attention to participation in parliamentary and municipal elections as a voters and candidates.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Political Empowerment of Women

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: To support women in creating income and employment generating economic activities and build their skills for better employment opportunities.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Economic Empowerment of women

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: Ensure that Gender issues are mainstreamed in the government entities and line ministries planning by building the national capacities in gender budgeting and establishing functioning “Equal Opportunities Units”.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Gender Mainstreaming in Minist
